name: h3
description: Introducing the 2025 Victus Vibe Pink Crayon Drop 10 JBB Baseball Bat, designed for young athletes aged 5-7 playing coach pitch. This bat boasts a mid-balanced swing feel, thanks to its innovative one-piece alloy composite construction, ensuring increased pop and extended durability with the VXP Alloy technology. The ringless barrel construction creates a thinner, more flexible sweet spot, while the micro-perforated soft-touch grip enhances feel and control. Certified with USSSA 1.15 BPF and featuring a 2 3/4-inch barrel diameter, the bat is perfect for young players seeking performance. Enjoy FAST & FREE shipping on all orders and a full 1-year warranty through the manufacturer. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
